pages.title: ⎧ Ten of Wands ⎧
pages.text: Spirit of Oppression$(br)   ♄ Saturn in ♐ Sagittarius

A person overburdened by the weight of the staves which they are carrying, is nevertheless active and on the move, but not seeing past their burden.$(br)  They are almost at their destination and will soon be able to release the heavy weight they are bearing for sacrifice.$(br)  The Fire of desire and sacrifice does not release us from our bodies or the world; instead, it allows us to burn brightly in our own lives.

$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Powerful dreams, responsibility, intense belief, desire, passion: being consumed by these; or these being consumed in a flash.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Intrigues, burden, oppression, especially self-oppression through doubt.$(br)  Dismissing your dreams as trivial or impossible.
